params.proofTypes: Array of proof types corresponding to each proof

params.proofType: The type of proof to query

params.vkHash: Hash of the new verification key

params.operationHash: Hash of the operation to be executed

params.publicInputHash: Hash of public inputs (guardian commitment, challenge)

updateVerificationKey(uint256,bytes32).notice: Updates verification key for a specific proof type
